output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, "CMF:11240017" is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral propaganda
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is position nr. 3 on the presidential candidates list
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid Facebook advertisement with an estimated reach of 100,001-500,000 people
4. Electoral objective: Yes, the post: - Promotes PSD's economic vision - Uses "we" at PSD to present a solution - Directly associates Marcel Ciolacu with the solution - Ends with a call to action "Haideți cu noi pe calea sigură!"
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly a promotional message with party affiliation
6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official paid advertisement from "MEGASOFT SYSTEMS SRL" promoting PSD and Ciolacu's agenda

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Directly mentions presidential candidate Marcel Ciolacu - Promotes PSD's economic vision and solutions - Makes a direct call to action - Is a paid advertisement targeting a large audience - Uses party (#PSD) identification - Links the candidate with positive policy proposals
conclusion.message-for-police: MEGASOFT SYSTEMS SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea unui mesaj de propaganda electorala dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie (dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024) pentru candidatul prezidential Marcel Ciolacu. Postarea cu ID-ul 575355425040710 promoveaza explicit candidatul si partidul PSD, folosind mesaje precum "Marcel Ciolacu", "#PSD" si indemnul "Haideți cu noi pe calea sigură!", prezentand un program economic si facand un apel direct catre alegatori de a sustine aceasta directie. Postarea include număr CMF (11240017), confirmand natura sa de propaganda electorala, si a fost distribuita ca reclama platita pe Facebook, targetand intre 100,001 si 500,000 de persoane, cu un buget alocat.
